mapper.select: SELECT ID AS id, PASSWORD AS password, NAME AS name, BIRTH AS birth, ADDR AS addr, GENDER AS gender, EMAIL AS email, PHONE AS phone, REGDATE AS regdate FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS seq, m.* FROM MEMBER m) WHERE seq BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT ID AS id, PASSWORD AS password, NAME AS name, BIRTH AS birth, ADDR AS addr, GENDER AS gender, EMAIL AS email, PHONE AS phone, REGDATE AS regdate FROM MEMBER WEHRE ID = #{id}
SELECT ID AS id, PASSWORD AS password, NAME AS name, BIRTH AS birth, ADDR AS addr, GENDER AS gender, EMAIL AS email, PHONE AS phone, REGDATE AS regdate FROM MEMBER WEHRE #{column} = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MEMBER
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET PASSWORD = #{password}, ADDR = #{addr}, PHONE = #{phone}, EMAIL = #{email} WHERE ID = #{id}
